website_summaries.verdict: A great affordable alternative to expensive drum kits, ideal for the beginner. Easy to customize your sound, this set comes with a seven-pad console with two foot pedals, stand, and drum sticks.
pros: This drum set includes 215 voices, with 20 preset kits, 10 assignable user kits and 100 preset songs to practice along to
The stand is adjustable for your height, whether standing or sitting
Console has a simple interface that lets you easily assign different drum sounds to pads
cons: The overall volume is too quiet for some

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, but preferred a real drum set
customer_reviews.text: We were very impressed with the quality of sound and all the features of this drum pad. My son tells me it’s just not quite as fun as playing on a real set, which we ultimately switched to. It does slide off the stand quite easily as others have mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: I think it's great for what I purchased it for
customer_reviews.text: This drum pad was bought for my 7 year old son to start taking drum lessons with. Overall, I think it's great for what I purchased it for. The sound quality is decent; it is good and loud enough for me to hear him practice in his room and yell for him to turn it down. My only gripe with this set is that on low volume, the sound is distorted and there is a weird buzzing in the speakers. I would recommend this for a child or a beginning player.
customer_reviews.author: penny8va

customer_reviews.title: happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this digital drum set for my 12 year old who recently became interested in playing. I am very happy with the buy. The stand is not the best, but it works. Still, for the price, this set is well worth the cash. He can drum away in his room, and never disturb the sleeping baby! That's my personal favorite part.
customer_reviews.author: squeakingzombie

customer_reviews.title: Spectrum Digital Drum Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to fill in drums on tracks I was writing at home. Also makes a great little travel drum set or if have limited space for drums in general. Great for the beginning student drummer. Awesome sound and response. Very durable. A #1 for its price.
customer_reviews.author: schalz

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Son loves it. So far the only negative is the foot pedals tend to fall over when the kids are using it which isn't a major complaint. Read somewhere that a Dad mounted them to a board so they couldn't fall over which seems like a great idea. All in all I'd recommend it for anyone who wants to drum but doesn't want to take up a lot of space until they are ready for a set. Even then, these are portable & sound pretty good so I wouldn't get rid of them even then.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great For A Beginner
customer_reviews.text: Coolest set ever for a beginner. My daughter is teaching herself how to play drums and this set has been great. I am very impressed with the progress she has made with this item.
customer_reviews.author: PE Florida

customer_reviews.title: Speakers quit working
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine until the speakers quit working. It began that I could fix by turning on and off then it would come back on. Now, the set has power but no sound comes out. Any ideas or who I could contact? TIA.
customer_reviews.author: HAYS Z WALLER

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the young musician!
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted a drum set for Christmas....We don't have the room or noise tolerance for a big set...so this was a perfect compromise...Have only used the basic features but volume control and headphones are a big plus!! It also sounds great! Price seems fair for what you get.. 5 months and still going strong with 4 boys and their friends enjoying it! I have no idea about quality for more professional needs...but it fit my needs perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: HarlequinMuse

customer_reviews.title: ... as a gift for a family member and they love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for a family member and they love it!. Although keep a reminder that the pedals tend to be sometimes very sensitive, and when you press one time it tends to sound like you press it two times.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not the best product to use if you're learning to play the ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the best product to use if you're learning to play the drums, but it is OK once you have experience playing an acoustic kit or an electronic kit that is a likeness of an acoustic kit. The pedals don't respond very well, so we're using other pedals.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Great sound fo the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised about how good this sounds. Great for home practicing or warm ups. The pads even detect lighter hits for ghost notes! You can get really groovy with one of these!
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Sloppy Joe
customer_reviews.text: Lacks the punch. The whole unit is a little bit on the damper side. The tactile feel of its pads is lack luster and the snare/drum kick pads are irritatingly slippery.
customer_reviews.author: En.N.Kay

customer_reviews.title: Son & Family love it
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as a way for our son to practice the drums without driving the family insane. It seems to be working really well. You can still here the tapping but not the crash, bang, boom of an actual drum set. It seems to be holding up well to his daily practice. It is not the same as a real drum set but fine for practice purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: i love this drum set but pedals move on you alot
customer_reviews.text: i love this drum set but pedals move on you alot. it may just be me being not so co-oradinated with my feet. my try putting pads down and velcroing them down to the pads. otherwise i think it's a great product for the price. sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: linda spurlock

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Our 7 yo loves drums and we love quiet. This was a gift from heaven. He sits in the garage for hours drumming away with headphones on. The guided instruction is great.
customer_reviews.author: BryanS

customer_reviews.title: The Beat Goes On
customer_reviews.text: This works as well as any unit of this price. I use it with a small amp in my music room. The drawback of these is that you must hit the center of small pads to make the sound. Good target practice for regular size pads on electronic drums or acoustic drums though.
customer_reviews.author: Pegleg

customer_reviews.title: Product as Described
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my 5 year old. it works fine. both my kids have a blast with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: alicia raines

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend. Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing set! I would highly recommend this for any person wanting to play the drums! It doesn’t take up too much room WiFi has is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Everyone was happy when headset arrived
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my grandson. Everyone was happy when headset arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Sallie Bendt

customer_reviews.title: Happy Grandson
customer_reviews.text: I gave this drum-set to my seven year old grandson for Christmas and two months later, it's still working just fine and he loves it! I read some of the unhappy reviews before I purchased it, but decided to take a chance. It was a good decision.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieDay

customer_reviews.title: return was fine and my son loves and loves playing on the ...
customer_reviews.text: first received a damaged drum no music, return was fine and my son loves and loves playing on the drum set.
customer_reviews.author: Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great drum set!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a drummer so reading all of the reviews from those who are was very helpful. I purchased this for my 7 year old grandson who has been drumming on everything since he was 2. I also purchased headphones so he doesn't drive my neighbors crazy when he plays. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: peacepatt

customer_reviews.title: great fro child
customer_reviews.text: Exact thing I wanted for a 7-year old learning the drums!
customer_reviews.author: SarahM

customer_reviews.title: He seems to love it. If he's happy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5 year old step son. He seems to love it. If he's happy, I'm happy. I'm not a drummer, but in a band. The drum sounds don't sound that bad, at least through good headphones.
customer_reviews.author: h8ed

customer_reviews.title: Very nice drum set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice drum set. The sound quality is perfect and is an easy way for kids to learn and practice on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's awesome, my 10yr old loves it! It's very durable and the build in speakers really pump!
customer_reviews.author: Adolfo Foronda

customer_reviews.title: Good drum over all
customer_reviews.text: Good drum over all, but foots pads cheap built, it's not the best idea of designed, out of control during playing. Move out of your steps.
customer_reviews.author: Linhking

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was for my son's 10th. birthday and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin last

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy and can withstand a bunch of nine year old ...
customer_reviews.text: We have had this set for a year now. It is sturdy and can withstand a bunch of nine year old boys playing their hearts out on it. The younger ones don't use the pedals often, but they work just fine. I recommend buying a throne with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6 year old who wanted a drum set, for the high quality and ability to use headphones with it. She is enjoying it thoroughly...as well as adults. Only reason for 4 stars is the stand does not seem sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Brienne Francisco

customer_reviews.title: 'Spectrum Digital Drum Set' review
customer_reviews.text: I got this drum set a year ago as a Christmas gift. It was my first digitial set and it's been fun to use, it's still fun to use. I like that I can put on my headphones and not be too loud. It's still working well and holding up good. Great first set. Lloyd (5th grader then, not goingto 6th)
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Gift for 10 year old
customer_reviews.text: Santa brought this for our 10 year old daughter and she LOVES it! She has never payed drums but is learning very quickly. Very user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 5

customer_reviews.title: Spectrum 602 7-pad digital drumset.
customer_reviews.text: Item was bought for a Christmas present for my 9 year old grandson and he absolutely loves it .He has hardly turned it off since he got it . Great thing about it though,is the headphone jack.he can play it and no one is annoyed by it.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Childree

customer_reviews.title: My son loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas present for my son, age 9. He wanted a drum set, but we did not have the room for a full set of drums. This worked out great and the sound is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: CoffeeCup

customer_reviews.title: Good Tool for kids learning drums.
customer_reviews.text: My Kids love this. son is 2 daughter is 9.
customer_reviews.author: Kia and CoachVtennis

customer_reviews.title: fine drum set - we're not pros' but enjoy it
customer_reviews.text: fine drum set - we're not pros' but enjoy it, and our little guy really likes it. And it has a volume control - unlike a drum set!
customer_reviews.author: bballheinz

customer_reviews.title: It is great to learn on and not as noisy as regular ...
customer_reviews.text: It is great to learn on and not as noisy as regular drums.
customer_reviews.author: bubbymarcia

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking headphones made this complete.
customer_reviews.text: The nephew loves it. My work here is done. *sits back and basks in the glow of being the most awesome aunt ever*
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Decent deal for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is supposed to do. Durable and easy to use. Foot pedals work well and the stand fairly well made.
customer_reviews.author: Danobegood

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect much...especially with it being so cheap. It has an amazing sound. Perfect for practicing on a bus or sitting around. It's worth every penny and it's rugged. The only cons are the pads are small so you have to be careful about hitting your sticks together. It has tons of sound effects, too. It's a hoot just as a toy!!! I love it. I may get my grandson one for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Saltydawg

customer_reviews.title: THE SCENE
customer_reviews.text: This thing can travel on THE SCENE with you, no problem!
customer_reviews.author: Jason R.

customer_reviews.title: these are great. the sound is as close to real as ...
customer_reviews.text: these are great.the sound is as close to real as you can get out of an electric drum set.id buy again great value,with a stand ,sticks and its usb so i can use them in my music editor.
customer_reviews.author: kevin r.

customer_reviews.title: Son likes it!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my son for christmas, he liked it a lot, very entertaining. Shipment was fast. Stank could be a little bit more sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Bertoli

customer_reviews.title: Set it quiet if you need to!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 7 year old grandson with Autism. He really enjoyed(s) this drum set. It has a place for headphone and you can turn the volumn down during practice! I researched a lot of drum sets. This was by far the best for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Webb

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the gift! My grandson loved it and helped pick out his 9 year old birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: I needed a light weight drum to practice with my amateur rock band, and carry it in a small package. The AIL 602 is perfect for that. When connected to a good amplifier - I used a regular 50 watts guitar amplifier, those who where in the surrounding area thought that there were real drums arround. You can experience the same sound without disturbing neighbors using a good pair of headphones. The only drawback are the pedals, that cannot stand still. Also you must put care in not hitting far from the center of the pads. Very good product
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Chait

customer_reviews.title: Is not holding up...
customer_reviews.text: The front rght pad has popped loose. Though it still works, it is very fragile and will not stay in place. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great features including headphone jack
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old loves this. Great features including headphone jack. I wish there was a carrying case for it though.
customer_reviews.author: mkcooney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for children!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 6 years old. She has been asking for months to get a drum set, last year it was a piano. She is musical but young and the idea of having drums going in my small home for hours at a time was less than appealing!...This is the perfect solution! It not only has volume control but you can also plug in headphones although you do need to get a adapter for them as the jack is made for the same size as the foot petal, not the typical phone headphones.- small price to pay in my book. Was delivered on time in excellent condition. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Riley

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic buy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with product. Purchased for my three children ages 5-15. They all enjoy learning to drum. The quality is very nice. They shipping was very fast. Satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Parker

customer_reviews.title: Easy to play, great quality drum set.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, very realistic. Good for beginner or professional.
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: Reconnect to your lost childhood dreams!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this drums because he is a frustrated drummer. He never pursued this career and was looking for something that would reconnect him to his initial drives in life. What child did not want to be a drummer at some point in his childhood years? Well, my husband can now sit and play drums with earphones on and not bother others in the house. It is that cool for him! The only downside is that he already has so little time left to spend with me and now I even have to share it with a digital drum!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little kit....
customer_reviews.text: Great little drum kit. Very easy to set up and use. Instruction booklet is not very clear in places, but everything is easy enough to figure out anyway. Sounds and responds much like an acoustic drum set. The only "complaint" is that the bass drum pedal isn't very good. I am in the process of replacing that at the moment. Otherwise, VERY pleased with this kit. Would highly reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: This is a good drum set for the money. Now if I could just get my wife to practice.
customer_reviews.author: MikeyB2200

customer_reviews.title: Great drum set
customer_reviews.text: We got this set for our 9 year old daughter for Christmas. I love the fact that it is nice enough for adult drummers to play on and yet is compact and (headphone accessible) quiet enough for her to store and play in her room. The tutorial mode is helpful for her. Everything seems very sturdy and was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: S. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Must've gotten a bad one.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my friend for Christmas. One month later he comes back around and shows me that the left cymbal pad broke and fell into the body. He told me that he didn't hit the pads too hard, so it's not his fault. And one more problem is that it won't react to your sticks about 1/10s of the time, skipping hi-hat beats and making weak snare drum sounds. In short it's an okay set to start off with, just don't expect too much from it.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Potts

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This set-up works for me in that whenever I want to play I just use this system instead of dragging out and setting up my full set. I play blues on the tv music station with my surround sound on and blasting I really enjoy it. Depends on what you want to do with it I guess.
customer_reviews.author: RENRUF

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: My six year old son loves the Digital Drum set. It was the perfect gift for son & parents....(has volume control).
customer_reviews.author: Lovin it

customer_reviews.title: Works well - wish it came with better instructions
customer_reviews.text: The drum machine sounds good and has lots of features. The instructions are not very good however so making full use of the features will be difficult and time consuming. I bought it for my 14yo daughter and she's losing interest in it already. There was supposed to be a video available on the website which is not there (or well hidden). I will hopefully find the time to learn how to use it better and then help my daughter to enjoy her present.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Witty

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: It is an extremely good electric drum set my 10-year-old loves it
customer_reviews.author: W.B.

customer_reviews.title: great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Good for kids. Cant hook up mp3. Foot pedals slide all around till I rigged up sumthin. They dont sound like a real drums foot pedals .Nice drumsticks came with it. Lots of cords in back.
customer_reviews.author: desiree pendleton

customer_reviews.title: My First Drum Machine
customer_reviews.text: The drum machine is nice but the paddles are not good. There are multiple kicks for one press. while playing the paddles move away. I corrected this with a drum mat. This is a new drum set but sometimes when a pad is hit no sound is produced. 2 months into the use of pedals, both of them broke. I love the sound of this machine when I use this with a sound mixer. It just becomes a totally different thing and I cannot stop my hands. Just wish I had a better throne as the one I bought with this is not something that I could sit on for long hours.
customer_reviews.author: Keshwan Prakash Ramlu

product_meta.title: Spectrum AIL 602 7-Pad Digital Drum Set with Adjustable Stand, Pedals, Sticks and AC Adapter
product_meta.description: Spectrum AIL-602 Seven Pad Digital Drum with Drum Stand. Features 2 Foot Pedals, 215 Voices, 20 Preset Kits, 10 User Kits & 1 Demo Song. Includes Drum Sticks, AC Adaptor and Heavy Duty Double Braced Fully Adjustable Drum Stand.
feature_bullets: Seven Fully Assignable Pads, with 215 Voices, 20 Preset Kits, 10 User Kits & 1 Demo Song
Includes Heavy Duty Height Adjustable Drum Stand. Suitable for Sitting or Standing Play. Angle Adjustable, Double Braced with Non-skid Rubber Feet. Drum Throne Not Included
Accessories Include AC Adaptor, Drum Sticks, Bonus Jam Tracks Download & Instructional Video Download

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars98 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
